item.title: Arch Linux install on Huawei MateBook Pro X 2019
item.description: A few people asked me what was I using as my daily driver. I have been using a Matebook X Pro 2019 since almost one year now, with Arch Linux as main distro. Super satisfied about it, I have no complaints and it’s perfect for my daily workflow. Here is a guide I wrote on how to install Arch Linux and fix the little things that don’t work out of the box.
